Name: Switch - Black & White
About the game: Minimalistic game in the style 'Black & White'. Game that will test your reaction. Interesting Puzzle Only White and Black colors 51 level Game for any language 1-3 hours of gameplay 100 achievements, to make a phrase on your profile ---------------------------------------------- Settings: Q - White background, black elements E - Black background, white elements R - Restart ---------------------------------------------- Special Thanks for help and support: -xanje, ZloyCrek, dr.crewcut, Flashline, Keylockkk, Rankaru, SmoothCriminal, Cruzzzzzo, Fejewell, medfinn, VitMak, METALL_091. ---------------------------------------------- Music - Perspectives Inspired by VOI, qop, Giana Sisters
